posts.message: The very old history of HTML (this document dates back to 1998)
posts.caption: www.w3.org
posts.description: HTML has had a life-span of roughly seven years. During that time, it has evolved from a simple language with a small number of tags to a complex system of mark-up, enabling authors to create all-singing-and-dancing Web pages complete with animated images, sound and all manner of gimmicks.
